name: Bloody Nano Wars
description:
Ludum Dare 38 Entry / Theme : A small world

Click on infected cell and see your nanobots destroy them.

This is a mix between a clicker and a tower defense at high speed, inside a blood simulation.

Features :

  • Hearthrate pulsating blood simulation
  • Build new robots to improve your army
  • Build radar or missile launcher to help you
  • Detailed HighScore

Tools used :

  • Unity
  • Gimp
  • Fruityloops
  • SketchUp

A game least 3 minutes.

Try yo beat my highscore : only 5 infected missed !

Good Luck to all ! #LD38
